Most recent results ( rw )
History of Present Illness
The patient presents with complaint of
It is characterized by respiratory distress .
Per patient 's nurse he had no overnight events .
Patient appears to be in no NAD .
He 's alert , sitting up in bed eating his breakfast .
He denies SOB or chest pain .
Physical Examination
Vital signs : normal
Constitutional
Alert , somewhat cooperative with the physical exam and in NAD .
Head
Normocephalic , atraumatic .
Face
Symmetrical .
Neck
Supple .
Heart
RR with no m/r/g 's appreciated .
Lungs
Rhonchi bilateral at the bases .
No wheezes or rales appreciated .
Poor respiratory effort .
Abdomen
Soft , nontender , nondistended with normal active BS .
No guarding or rebound noted .
Extremities
No clubbing or cyanosis
Mental status
Alert but not oriented to person , place or date
Impression and Plan
General Plan
1- CV - RBBB Patient continues to be asymptomatic .
We will continue his cardiac meds and his current meds for HTN .
2- Pulm - CXR shows patchy pneumonia in LLL , posterior .
Patient continues to be afebrile .
We will continue his Unasyn but will switch to Augmentum prior to discharge .
We will f/u on his sputum cultures .
Patient 's blood cultures show NGTD .
Speech evaluation was negative for aspiration .
3. Endo - DM Continue SSI as needed and AM Glyburide .
4. Renal - Urinary retention .
Patient has a negative UA .
Urine culture is pending .
Continue foley for now .
5. Dispo - OT / PT consult ordered to perform voiding trials once patient is able to get to the bathroom .
Discharge pending bed availability .
6. Nutrition - Patient has Boost - diabetic liquid supplement ordered to improve his low albumin level .
**INSTITUTION Intern Admit
Perform by **NAME[XXX , WWW M] ( on **DATE[Dec 06 2007] 11:02 )
Sign by **NAME[XXX , WWW M] ( on **DATE[Dec 06 2007] 11:02 )
VERIFY by **NAME[XXX , WWW M] ( on **DATE[Dec 06 2007] 11:02 )
